title: [Health] 30% of cancer contents on social media are unproven info. Some cancer patients use unproven alternative or supplementary treatments without consulting medical professionals, which leads to delaying or rejecting existing treatments, sharply reducing their survival possibilities.

[Health] A recent study has found that the colour of plateware in which food was served had an influence on the perceived saltiness and desirability of the snack food for picky but not for non-picky eaters
